The European Union is calling for an international tribunal...
...after the discovery of mass graves near Ukraine's northeast city of Izyum.
The Kremlin denies its forces were behind the alleged atrocities,...
...but investigators say they have already found extensive evidence.
Forensic experts pull a body from a grave in this forest outside of Izyum.
The city was liberated by the Ukrainian Army...
...in a counter-offensive that exposed alleged war crimes by Russian forces.
As exhumations continue, investigators describe some of their findings.
